game.title: The Missing Crystal
game.objective: Retrieve the missing crystal from the Ruins of Eldorado.
game.description: The crystal is said to have magical properties and is needed for a powerful ritual. It was last seen in the hands of the ancient guardian, who resides deep within the ruins.
game.reward: 50 gold coins and a rare potion.

task.objective: Speak to the guardian in the Ruins of Eldorado and learn about the crystal.
task.description: The guardian is known for his cryptic answers, so be prepared for a challenge.

task.objective: Return to Farmer Bob with the guardian's riddle solution.
task.description: The solution to the riddle will lead you to the crystal's location.
